readable.title: 2522467011_cc825d89ac
readable.content: A girl in a red and white dress is playing with hula hoops . a girl in a red skirt with some hula hoops A little girl hula hoops with multiple colorful hoops . A little girl in a long red skirt is hula hooping with four brightly colored hula hoops . The small girl in the red skirt played with the hula hoops .
